comment.author: 32836682@N07
comment._content: I was there - This pic was taken at "Sandy Beach" located at North Severn at Annapolis Md.. N3N's were used for aircraft indoctrination to "middies" at the Academy. Above pics show where the middies changed aircraft to go on another flight. I was there from April of 1950 to June 1952, one great tour of duty. NAF Annapolis closed down in 1956. CWO-2 John E. Printy, USN Ret.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
